images.copyright: Adélie penguins in Antarctica (© David Merron Photography/Getty Images)
images.title: Chilling out on World Penguin Day
images.caption: World Penguin Day
images.desc: Penguins are pretty amazing. From their social personalities to their impressive talent for swimming and diving, they're a bird worth celebrating. Today, World Penguin Day, is the perfect time to learn more about these flightless birds, noted for their swimming prowess.
images.bsTitle: Chilling out on World Penguin Day
